DaprSidecarTrait.description: The specifies that the component should have a Dapr sidecar injected

appPort.description: The Dapr appPort. Specifies the internal listening port for the application to handle requests from the Dapr sidecar.

appId.description: The Dapr appId. Specifies the identifier used by Dapr for service invocation.

config.description: Specifies the Dapr configuration to use for the component.

protocol.description: Specifies the Dapr app-protocol to use for the component.

provides.description: Specifies the resource id of a dapr.io.DaprHttpRoute that can route traffic to this component.
